body_content.explanation: An unbridged river, stream, etc. does not have a bridge over a particular part of it:
examples: In order to get to church, we had to cross an unbridged river.
The route took us over seven, as yet unbridged, canals.

body_content.explanation: If there is an unbridged difference between two people, groups, or things, it has not been possible to make them understand each other or agree:
examples: She worried about the unbridged chasm between Lucy and herself.
The climate conference closed with many gaps still unbridged.
